statements: SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM user_profiles ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, full_name, phone_number FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id IN (3, 7, 10);
SELECT user_id, full_name, email, phone_number FROM user_profiles ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM contact_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_profiles WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT u.first_name, c.phone_number FROM user_profiles u JOIN contact_information c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, c.address FROM user_profiles u LEFT JOIN contact_information c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT u.first_name, u.email, c.phone_number FROM user_profiles u RIGHT JOIN contact_information c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;

SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT phone_number, username FROM user_profiles WHERE email = 'example@email.com';
SELECT full_name, company_name FROM contact_info WHERE contact_id = 3;
SELECT position, user_id FROM team_members WHERE team_member_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE email LIKE 'example.com';
SELECT user_profiles.*, contact_info.full_name FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN contact_info ON user_profiles.user_id = contact_info.user_id;
SELECT user_profiles.username, team_members.position FROM user_profiles LEFT JOIN team_members ON user_profiles.user_id = team_members.user_id;

SELECT user_profiles.username, contact_info.full_name, team_members.position FROM user_profiles INNER JOIN contact_info ON user_profiles.user_id = contact_info.user_id LEFT JOIN team_members ON user_profiles.user_id = team_members.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, full_name, email FROM users ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT job_title, department FROM profiles WHERE profile_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, team_name, position FROM team_members WHERE team_name = 'Engineering';
SELECT u.username, p.job_title, c.phone_number FROM users u JOIN profiles p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN contact_information c ON u.user_id = c.user_id;
SELECT u.full_name, p.job_title, t.team_name FROM users u JOIN profiles p ON u.user_id = p.user_id JOIN team_members t ON u.user_id = t.user_id;
SELECT u.full_name, c.address, c.city, c.state, c.country FROM users u JOIN contact_information c ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE u.age > 30;
SELECT u.username, t.position, t.join_date FROM users u JOIN team_members t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.position = 'Manager';
SELECT u.full_name, t.team_name FROM users u JOIN team_members t ON u.user_id = t.user_id ORDER BY u.user_id DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT full_name, username, email FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, role FROM UserProfiles WHERE full_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM ContactInfo WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles ORDER BY username DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT full_name, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE role = 'Admin'
SELECT username, role FROM UserProfiles WHERE role != 'Admin' ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT contact_id, phone_number FROM ContactInfo WHERE address LIKE '%Street%'
